basic_data.Recipient Name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA AT RIVERSIDE
basic_data.Description: THE PRIMARY PURPOSE OF THIS AGREEMENT IS TO PRODUCE AND SUPPLYPATHOGEN-TESTED CLEAN PLANT UNITS (BUDWOOD) FOR CITRUS PROPAGATION TOPRODUCERS (NURSERIES AND GROWERS), SCIENTISTS, AND THE GENERAL PUBLICVIA THERAPY, DIAGNOSTICS, MAINTENANCE AND DISTRIBUTION FROM FOUNDATIONFACILITIES. THE CITRUS CLONAL PROTECTION PROGRAM (CCPP) IS OPERATING ONSIX FUNCTIONAL PILLARS: 1. INTRODUCTION OF CITRUS VARIETIES UNDERQUARANTINE IN THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA. 2.TESTING OF THE CITRUS VARIETIESPROPAGATIVE MATERIAL FOR GRAFT TRANSMISSIBLE DISEASES/PATHOGENS. 3.ELIMINATION OF GRAFT-TRANSMISSIBLE PATHOGENS FROM THE PROPAGATIVEMATERIAL. 4.MAINTENANCE AND CONTINUOUS PATHOGEN RE-TESTING OF THESOURCES OF THE CITRUS PROPAGATIVE MATERIAL. 5. DISTRIBUTION OFPATHOGEN-TESTED AND TRUE-TO-TYPE PRIMARY CITRUS PROPAGATIVE MATERIAL FORTHE NEEDS OF THE CITRUS INDUSTRY, RESEARCHERS, CITRUS ENTHUSIASTS, ANDNCPN-CITRUS CENTERS. 6. EXTENSION OF SCIENTIFIC INFORMATION FOR CITRUSDIAGNOSTICS, THERAPY, GERMPLASM, DISEASE MANAGEMENT, AND NOVELCITRICULTURE TECHNOLOGIES. THIS PROJECT WILL PROVIDE A SAFE MECHANISMFOR INTRODUCTION INTO CALIFORNIA OF CITRUS VARIETIES FROM ANYCITRUS-GROWING AREA OF THE WORLD. THE CCPP MAINTAINS OVER 400 CITRUSVARIETIES AND THE BUDWOOD SYSTEM SUPPORTS REQUESTS FROM THOUSANDS OFUSERS AND DISTRIBUTE TENS OF THOUSANDS OF CLEAN PLANT UNITS EACH YEAR.THE IMPACT OF THE CCPP IN THE CITRUS GERMPLASM QUALITY, AVAILABILITY ANDACCESSIBILITY HAS BEEN TREMENDOUS AND HAS BENEFITED A DIVERSE GROUP OFSTAKE HOLDERS SUCH AS CITRUS NURSERIES, GROWERS, REGULATORS AND THE GENERAL PUBLIC AS CITRUS ENTHUSIASTS. THIS IS PARTICULARLY IMPORTANT NOW SINCE THE USA CITRICULTURE IS FIGHTING AGAINST THE DEADLYHUANGLONGBING (HLB) DISEASE AND AVAILABILITY OF PATHOGEN-TESTED CITRUSBUDWOOD IS THE CORNERSTONE OF A SUCCESSFUL AND SUSTAINABLE DISEASEMANAGEMENT PROGRAM.
basic_data.Awarding Sub Agency: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service

detailed_data.description: THE PRIMARY PURPOSE OF THIS AGREEMENT IS TO PRODUCE AND SUPPLYPATHOGEN-TESTED CLEAN PLANT UNITS (BUDWOOD) FOR CITRUS PROPAGATION TOPRODUCERS (NURSERIES AND GROWERS), SCIENTISTS, AND THE GENERAL PUBLICVIA THERAPY, DIAGNOSTICS, MAINTENANCE AND DISTRIBUTION FROM FOUNDATIONFACILITIES. THE CITRUS CLONAL PROTECTION PROGRAM (CCPP) IS OPERATING ONSIX FUNCTIONAL PILLARS: 1. INTRODUCTION OF CITRUS VARIETIES UNDERQUARANTINE IN THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA. 2.TESTING OF THE CITRUS VARIETIESPROPAGATIVE MATERIAL FOR GRAFT TRANSMISSIBLE DISEASES/PATHOGENS. 3.ELIMINATION OF GRAFT-TRANSMISSIBLE PATHOGENS FROM THE PROPAGATIVEMATERIAL. 4.MAINTENANCE AND CONTINUOUS PATHOGEN RE-TESTING OF THESOURCES OF THE CITRUS PROPAGATIVE MATERIAL. 5. DISTRIBUTION OFPATHOGEN-TESTED AND TRUE-TO-TYPE PRIMARY CITRUS PROPAGATIVE MATERIAL FORTHE NEEDS OF THE CITRUS INDUSTRY, RESEARCHERS, CITRUS ENTHUSIASTS, ANDNCPN-CITRUS CENTERS. 6. EXTENSION OF SCIENTIFIC INFORMATION FOR CITRUSDIAGNOSTICS, THERAPY, GERMPLASM, DISEASE MANAGEMENT, AND NOVELCITRICULTURE TECHNOLOGIES. THIS PROJECT WILL PROVIDE A SAFE MECHANISMFOR INTRODUCTION INTO CALIFORNIA OF CITRUS VARIETIES FROM ANYCITRUS-GROWING AREA OF THE WORLD. THE CCPP MAINTAINS OVER 400 CITRUSVARIETIES AND THE BUDWOOD SYSTEM SUPPORTS REQUESTS FROM THOUSANDS OFUSERS AND DISTRIBUTE TENS OF THOUSANDS OF CLEAN PLANT UNITS EACH YEAR.THE IMPACT OF THE CCPP IN THE CITRUS GERMPLASM QUALITY, AVAILABILITY ANDACCESSIBILITY HAS BEEN TREMENDOUS AND HAS BENEFITED A DIVERSE GROUP OFSTAKE HOLDERS SUCH AS CITRUS NURSERIES, GROWERS, REGULATORS AND THE GENERAL PUBLIC AS CITRUS ENTHUSIASTS. THIS IS PARTICULARLY IMPORTANT NOW SINCE THE USA CITRICULTURE IS FIGHTING AGAINST THE DEADLYHUANGLONGBING (HLB) DISEASE AND AVAILABILITY OF PATHOGEN-TESTED CITRUSBUDWOOD IS THE CORNERSTONE OF A SUCCESSFUL AND SUSTAINABLE DISEASEMANAGEMENT PROGRAM.
